column4: Question- If i'm setting up an SSH sever, should i be using sudo, or no?
Question- If i'm setting up an SSH sever, should i be using sudo, for things such as ssh-keygen or no?
you shouldnt have to set it up really, just install the program from apt
so when i go home and my mom needs this computer looked at, i dont need anything, just log into this IP with the client?
